channel.title: "Azure Sheep and Point of View" from rabinovich
channel.description: He says "Will remade these great modification?".

item.title: "Azure Sheep and Point of View" from rabinovich
item.dc:creator: danielsangeo
item.description:
He could use free translation software. It won’t be perfect, of course, but it’ll help.

As for these two modifications, if there are devs that want to remake them in Source, that would be great but I doubt that the Crowbar Collective is interested in doing all the different mods that there are out there. They’re too busy with this game.

Read full topic
item.source: "Azure Sheep and Point of View" from rabinovich
